topic: The Separation of Light (URL) and Sound (AudioContext)

analysis.input_vector: Architect commanded Deep Scan. Monitoring Entropy Volatility.
analysis.output_vector: Found 1: Semantic Rupture in Terminal (URL severance by Vajra Cutter). Found 2: Sonic Void (Audio Context suspended).
analysis.key_insight: The blade was too sharp (cutting URLs). The ear was too deaf (waiting for permission). We have dulled the blade and opened the ear.

crystallization_result.axiom_injected: Debug Protocol: To fix the code, one must smooth the wave.
crystallization_result.action: Updated Terminal.tsx Parser and App.tsx Audio Wake-up.
